statements: UPDATE property_locations SET property_name = 'Hotel ABC', country = 'USA', market_trend = 'Stable' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE property_locations SET country = 'Canada', market_trend = 'Growing', location_geography = geography::STGeomFromText('POINT(-122.335197 47.592471)', 4326) WHERE property_name = 'Resort XYZ';
UPDATE property_locations SET property_name = 'Luxurious Apartment', location_geography = ST_POINT(-122.333056, 47.609722), market_trend = 'Rising' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE property_locations SET country = 'France', location_geography = ST_POINT(-0.57918, 44.837789), market_trend = 'Stable', property_name = 'Villa Paradis' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE property_locations SET property_name='New Property Name' WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE market_trends SET trend_value=1500.00, trend_description='Increased market demand' WHERE trend_id = 'a1234567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE property_locations SET property_name = 'Updated Property Name', property_address = '123 Updated Address Street', country_code = 'US', lat = 40.7128, lon = -74.0060 WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE market_trends SET trend_value = 25.75, trend_description = 'Updated trend description' WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND trend_date = '2022-02-28';
UPDATE property_locations SET city='New York', latitude=40.7128, longitude=-74.0060 WHERE property_id=123;
UPDATE market_trends SET market_demand=5, trend_date='2022-08-10' WHERE property_id=456;
UPDATE property_locations SET address='123 Main St', city='Anytown', country='USA' WHERE property_id=1;
UPDATE market_trends SET market_value=150000.50, market_demand=75 WHERE trend_id=2;
UPDATE Country SET country_name = 'USA' WHERE country_id = 1;
UPDATE Property SET property_type = 'Commercial' WHERE property_id = 3;
UPDATE Country SET country_name = 'New Country Name' WHERE country_id = 1;
UPDATE Location SET latitude = 40.7831, longitude = -73.9712 WHERE location_id = 2;
UPDATE property_locations SET city='New York', street_address='123 Main St' WHERE property_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE market_trends SET market_value=50000.00, time_period='2022-01-15 12:00:00' WHERE region='North America'
UPDATE property_locations SET country='Canada', city='Toronto' WHERE property_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE market_trends SET region='Asia', market_value=500000.75 WHERE trend_id=100;
